com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.navigation.camera

Class RouteInformation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mapbox.services.android.navigation.v5.navigation.camera.RouteInformation

  • public abstract class RouteInformation
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds all information related to a route and a user's progress along the route. It also provides useful information (screen configuration and target distance) which can be used to make additional configuration changes to the map's camera.
    Since:
    0.8.1

    • Constructor Summary

      RouteInformation()

      abstract android.content.res.Configuration configuration()
      The device's current configuration which can be used to return different zoom values given it's orientation.

      abstract android.location.Location location()
      The user's current location along the route.

      The current route the user is navigating along.
      abstract RouteProgress routeProgress()
      The user's current progress along the route.
      abstract double targetDistance()
      The camera target distance as a percentage of the total phone screen the view uses.

      • configuration

        @NonNull
public abstract android.content.res.Configuration configuration()
        The device's current configuration which can be used to return different zoom values given it's orientation.
        Returns:
        device's current configuration
        Since:
        0.8.1

      • targetDistance

        public abstract double targetDistance()
        The camera target distance as a percentage of the total phone screen the view uses.
        Returns:
        camera target distance
        Since:
        0.8.1

      • route

        @Nullable
public abstract com.mapbox.api.directions.v5.models.DirectionsRoute route()
        The current route the user is navigating along. This value will update when reroutes occur and it will be null if the RouteInformation is generated from an update to route progress or from an orientation change.
        Returns:
        current route
        Since:
        0.8.1

      • location

        @Nullable
public abstract android.location.Location location()
        The user's current location along the route. This value will update when orientation changes occur as well as when progress along a route changes.
        Returns:
        current location
        Since:
        0.8.1

      • routeProgress

        @Nullable
public abstract RouteProgress routeProgress()
        The user's current progress along the route.
        Returns:
        current progress along the route.
        Since:
        0.8.1
